description:
The Arnside consists of a stylish, functional blend of high-quality materials. The perforated nubuck leather upper is matched with an air-permeable, mesh lining and a comfortable, sporty sole, making it the ideal companion for active outdoor use –– including on hot, summer days. This sporty sneaker is also at home in moderate trips in rougher territory, including deeper mountain terrain, as well as everyday use. All its materials are sourced 100% from European suppliers for high quality and durability and it’s made in Europe.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion
name: HanWag Arnside - Mens
